repository.description: Repository where the issue is located.

node_id.description: Unique identifier for the issue node.

url.description: URL to retrieve more details about the issue.

repository_url.description: URL to retrieve more details about the repository.

labels_url.description: URL to retrieve labels associated with the issue.

comments_url.description: URL to retrieve comments on the issue.

events_url.description: URL to retrieve events related to the issue.

html_url.description: URL to view the issue on GitHub.

user_id.description: Identifier of the user who opened the issue.

labels.description: List of labels attached to the issue.

node_id.description: Unique identifier for the label node.

url.description: URL to retrieve more details about the label.

default.description: Flag indicating if the label is a default label.

assignees.description: List of users assigned to the issue.

items.description: List of users assigned to the issue.

milestone.description: Details of the milestone associated with the issue.

url.description: URL to retrieve more details about the milestone.

html_url.description: URL to view the milestone on GitHub.

labels_url.description: URL to retrieve labels associated with the milestone.

node_id.description: Unique identifier for the milestone node.

open_issues.description: Number of open issues in the milestone.

closed_issues.description: Number of closed issues in the milestone.

created_at.description: Date and time when the milestone was created.

updated_at.description: Date and time when the milestone was last updated.

closed_at.description: Date and time when the milestone was closed.

due_on.description: Date and time when the milestone is due.

locked.description: Flag indicating if the issue is locked.

active_lock_reason.description: Reason for the active lock on the issue, if any.

comments.description: Number of comments on the issue.

pull_request.description: Details of a linked pull request, if the issue is a pull request.

url.description: URL to retrieve more details about the pull request.

html_url.description: URL to view the pull request on GitHub.

diff_url.description: URL to view the diff of the pull request.

patch_url.description: URL to view the patch of the pull request.

merged_at.description: Date and time when the pull request was merged.

closed_at.description: Date and time when the issue was closed.

created_at.description: Date and time when the issue was created.

updated_at.description: Date and time when the issue was last updated.

author_association.description: The association of the author with the issue.

draft.description: Flag indicating if the issue is a draft.

timeline_url.description: URL to retrieve the timeline of the issue.

performed_via_github_app.description: Information related to the GitHub App that performed actions on the issue.

id.description: Unique identifier for the GitHub app.

node_id.description: Unique identifier for the GitHub app node.

owner.description: User who owns the GitHub app.

external_url.description: External URL associated with the GitHub app.

html_url.description: URL to view the GitHub app on GitHub.

created_at.description: Date and time when the GitHub app was created.

updated_at.description: Date and time when the GitHub app was last updated.

permissions.description: Permissions granted to the GitHub App on the issue.

issues.description: Permissions related to issues for the GitHub app.

metadata.description: Permissions related to metadata for the GitHub app.

pull_requests.description: Permissions related to pull requests for the GitHub app.

actions.description: Permissions related to actions for the GitHub app.

checks.description: Permissions related to checks for the GitHub app.

contents.description: Permissions related to contents for the GitHub app.

deployments.description: Permissions related to deployments for the GitHub app.

discussions.description: Permissions related to discussions for the GitHub app.

repository_projects.description: Permissions related to repository projects for the GitHub app.

statuses.description: Permissions related to statuses for the GitHub app.

events.description: List of events performed by the GitHub App on the issue.

items.description: List of events performed by the GitHub app.

state_reason.description: Reason for the state of the issue.
